All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
Customer
The class Customer provides a concrete implementation for a Customer object
CustomerList
The class CustomerList provides a array object that holds any number of Customer objects
Driver
The class Driver provides a concrete implementation for a Driver object
DriverList
The class DriverList provides a array object that holds any number of Driver objects
IOHandler
Handles all connections to the outside world
Location
The class Location provides a concrete implementation for a Location object
Meal
The class Meal provides a concrete implementation for a Meal object
MealLineItem
The class MealLineItem provides a concrete implementation for a MealLineItem object.
MealList
The class MealList provides a array object that holds any number of Meal objects
Menu
The class Menu provides a array object that holds any number of Meal objects A Menu is unique to a specific Restaurant and contains all the Meals offered by that Restaurant
Order
The class Order provides a concrete implementation for a Order object An Order object represents a food order by a given customer, from a given restaurant, to be delivered by a given driver
OrderList
The class OrderList provides a array object that holds any number of Order objects
Program
Provides a console based application to run the Quick Food Order System.
Restaurant
The class Restaurant provides a concrete implementation for a Restaurant object
RestaurantList
The class RestaurantList provides a array object that holds any number of Restaurant objects
